text: Liberty Hall is a comedy-drama play by the British writer R. C. Carton which premiered in London in 1892. ==Film adaptation== In 1914 the play was turned into a film of the same title directed by Harold M. Shaw.Goble p.73 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1892 plays Category:British plays adapted into films Category:Plays set in England Category:Plays by R. C. Carton
title: Liberty Hall (play)
